website_summaries.verdict: One of the largest bottles of mass gainer powder you can buy without spending too much money.
pros: Comes in a 7 pound container that lasts for several servings before needing to be replaced
Meant to be mixed with skim milk for a healthy, energizing beverage appropriate for any time of the day
cons: Powder is thicker than others, often requiring a blender for best results

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: My husband is gaining muscle quicker with this protein! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kymberly

customer_reviews.title: A perfect combination to build some serious muscle
customer_reviews.text: This mass gainer is packed with 1000 calories, about 60 grams of protein, 10 grams of creatine, 160 grams of carbs, and bcaas!!! You are basically getting three products in one. A perfect combination to build some serious muscle. It's definitely the best mass gainer I've have had, and I will continue to use it. It mixes great and does not make you feel bloated which many have a tendency to do.
customer_reviews.author: joseph cretella

customer_reviews.title: DONT GET VANILLA
customer_reviews.text: DONT GET VANILLA it is absolutely disgusting. Cookies and cream is pretty good and strawberry is really good. This mass gainer has helped me pack on A LOT of muscle mass and I highly recommend it especially for the cost. A full surving is 5 scoops which will make a massive shake. I recommend doing 2 shakes with 2 scoops each which makes it much easier to drink and helps absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Cozad

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money (Strawberry flavored )
customer_reviews.text: WAY too thick. 5 scoops and 16 oz of skim milk and it was utter undrinkable. Tried to suck it through a straw and my jaw started hurting.(Strawberry) WAY too much filler, I felt like I was about to throw up On that point I stopped using it immediately
customer_reviews.author: cimi

customer_reviews.title: Helps with BMI.
customer_reviews.text: Husband has gastroparesis. Lost 50 lbs. used Muscle Tech to help with the protein and to build mass. In 4 months went from 141 lbs to 163 lbs. took his BMI from 17 to 21. Love this stuff!! Tastes great too
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This is beast.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I started using this product just a week and a half ago and I already gained 6 pounds! I haven't gone through the whole container yet as I'm using 4 scoops instead of the 5 recommended along with a banana, a spoon of PB and milk. Of course I'm not just taking this by itself and that is not recommended. I've been eating like crazy (no dirty foods).
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, not chalky
customer_reviews.text: Cookies & cream doesn’t taste bad. It’s alright by itself but I added a banana to mine & tastes like a normal banana smoothie. I used a blender for mine so it’s pretty smooth but I only added 3 scoops. This is my first time trying any weight gainer/protein powder & I like this one. I’ll probably stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Great gainer, great flavor.
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it claims. The flavor if this gainer is literally some of the best I've ever tried, and I've tried a LOT of different ones. Not only does this product not have a nasty metallic after taste like a lot of protein powders, but it also leaves almost zero mouth feel after you swallow it. That means when you are finished at the gym and you want to down a shake really quick, you won't have the urge to gag because of a horrible residue or flavor left in the back of your mouth. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Crosswhite

customer_reviews.title: Use a Blender
customer_reviews.text: You’ll have to use a blender for this. I use 2 scoops each time, once in the morning and another at night. Mixed with 2 cups of whole milk, pack of oats, some frozen fruits, and couple teaspoons of cashew/peanut butter, this will come out to be about 1000 calories each shake. Tastes great and easy to down, I ordered strawberry. Tried using a shaker cup with just 2 scoops and there were still clumps, so the recommended 5-scoop servings will have no chance in a shaker. Dump it in the blender for 20 seconds and it’ll be smooth.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not the best mass gainer out there
customer_reviews.text: Tastes nasty and for the price it isn’t any better than any other mass gainer. Lots of protien and creatine though, which is about the only good thing. I recommend GNC’s Bulk 1340. It has tons of calories and tastes pretty good (in my opinion). Also as soon as I switched to it I noticed a huge increase in my gains.
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: Let's gain some weight and muscle
customer_reviews.text: Firstly , if you are looking for a protein powder that will help you gain LEAN mass, then stop reading right now and look elsewhere. This protein powder is for people like myself who have trouble gaining weight and want to put on some muscle/mass. You also need to make sure you are acut ally working out, if not you'll just gain fat.
customer_reviews.author: Tan Tran

customer_reviews.title: The stuffs great!
customer_reviews.text: By these other reviews, most of these meat heads are too dumb to just not mix it as directed...thin it out some. I do, best stuff ever. Meat heads should stay in gym and not talk in public. I'm buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Add mass with less sugar!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you're eating enough good food, training hard, and add a serving of this to boost your hard work! Add this where you'll need the extra calories, or just have a couple servings a day if you like the dirty-bulk!
customer_reviews.author: mrcamillo

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it!! From 109 to 121 plus eating at all times , just what I was looking for.!
customer_reviews.author: Mmtnz

customer_reviews.title: Serving size
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the serving size before purchasing and thought this was a GREAT deal! The serving size is FIVEEEEEEE scoops! I got the vanilla and it tastes horrible. But I only have been using one scoop until I saw the serving size. Just make sure to read it! And I would not recommend vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting Flavor
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was horrendous. I have no idea how they screwed up “vanilla” so badly. I’ve used a ton of different gainers and none are delicious but this was the worst I’ve ever experienced by far. The only thing I can say is maybe this container had gone bad because nothing else could really explain it.
customer_reviews.author: trock

customer_reviews.title: Tastes ok but way too thick
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a body builder, would just like to put on a few pounds due to low appetite. The taste is pretty good (chocolate) but it is much too thick when mixed as the instructions stated. Basically it’s like drinking mud. And I find 5 scoops at a time to be too filling. I solved this by using 3 scoops 3x a day with 16 oz milk. Too soon to see any meaningful results, will report back in a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Theisen II

customer_reviews.title: Good Mass Gainer
customer_reviews.text: I like Mass Tech in comparison to most mass gainers. The flavor is better than most, and I usually feel pretty full after taking it, which is crucial. Gained lean mass for sure and recommend this product to those looking to check out mass gainers. This is definitely one of the better ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick everyday after taking it hours later would be nauseous for hours and almost vomiting .
customer_reviews.text: Only gave it 4 start because I was nauseous all mornings after taking it hours later , how ever straberry flavor was good . Had to blend it otherwise it would be chuncky . I decide to stop it and eat more . after stopping this product 2 days later no nausea at all .
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is phenomenal..it's alittle pricey, but they all cost alot
customer_reviews.author: John Hayhurst

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had the bigger size
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little cheaper on price but it’s a brand name so can’t expect it to be too cheap. Sad they didn’t have this specific blend in a bigger size. The carb blend is pretty high quality if you look at the ingredients and the protein is great for recovery too.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is off the charts!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 4 days in and I absolutely love the chocolate flavor. I use 2 scoops 3 times a day and mix those 2 scoops with 24 ounces of whole milk. Already adding some size to my chest and arms. Stacking this with one serving of Cell Tech grape flavor. I'll be buying both again, soon.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron E.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff add a couple scoops of peanut butter and a splash of Stevia and everybody wants to drink it lol
customer_reviews.author: Streetglider

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This product gives you the result you want. I use it for bulking up and it really worked. I felt it was better than ON. Easy to mix and good flavor
customer_reviews.author: BIJITH T G

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: I read all the great reviews and went for it This is horrible, super sweet taste , too thick creamy Just gross
customer_reviews.author: csilvatexas

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used a gainer like this. I have to admit though it really does seem to work. I split my servings in half though and I still felt full and I felt like I was putting on some serious mass. Although I didn't measure before and after, when I look in the mirror, I did appear larger in my chest and arms.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Ew
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes awful compared to other gainers and it doesn’t mix well. You have to fill an entire 20 oz blender bottle to get the nutrients that they claim. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Sekiller

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t received the new look
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about the product and the value of money that I bought it but I thought I was gonna get the new look of Mass Tech like it says in the description not the old one.
customer_reviews.author: veconcept3

customer_reviews.title: Great Gainer
customer_reviews.text: One of my first gainers to try out and really happy with the product. Great flavor. Provides a ton of calories/carbs/protein. The amino and creatine combination is also helpful. I've noticed it's definitely helped in recovering from workouts and packing on size.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Toljanic

customer_reviews.title: Read before u buy this
customer_reviews.text: The 15$ protien powder from kroger tasted better than this. 5 scoops per serving is ridiculous for 1000 calories, and very hard to completely mix well.
customer_reviews.author: ITALY

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. Started to see results in a week after receiving this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Godino

customer_reviews.title: Mixability is fair. Taste fair. Not gross.
customer_reviews.text: Just received 2 days ago. Mixability is not great with milk or water. Flavor I have is chocolate and it's not very good, decent enough to drink tho. Hoping the results are as they say. Looking forward to seeing gains. Love there's creatine in it as well as glutamine plus a great dose of BCAAs.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Schnell

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Will continue to repurchase on here for my husband! Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Torres

customer_reviews.title: Flat out works
customer_reviews.text: I use this product off an on. Every time I'm on a cycle, I am able to quickly pack on lean muscle, and I definitely get stronger. It's a great product. It does give me really bad gas and loose stools, but I don't really care too much about that because of the results I get. But I do cycle off of it now and then to let my digestive system get back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Too Sweet
customer_reviews.text: It’s extremely sweet. It’s hard for me to take it. I can’t say much more as I’m not enjoying it; I’ll probably end up throwing it away
customer_reviews.author: Arash Amirkhansarie

customer_reviews.title: Effective protein
customer_reviews.text: This protein was very effective. I could see results from this product within a few weeks. I followed the directions as it was written. The taste is great and it mixes well. I would recommend this product and the size, as it is lasting me quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best protein ever..
customer_reviews.text: I'm a regular costumer of Muscle tech products. This protein is the best for me, good flavor and good quality... I really recommended...

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quantity.
customer_reviews.text: Warning: BIG A** CONTAINER!!! Great flavor. Mixes pretty smoothly with no clumps. Pretty good quantity so it will last a while.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My husband said is a good product. Can be pricey at times though

customer_reviews.title: will buy again

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Strawberry Taste!
customer_reviews.text: This protein is very thick. 5 scoops equals 1 serving, but it’s what’s needed to pack on the weight and mass. Good stuff and great taste!

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great price, good flavor.... really like it & would buy again!

customer_reviews.text: Good amount for the cost, definitely makes it easier to put on weight for skinnier guys like me

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awful
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes awful and it isn't thick enough even with milk. Has a weird che0flavor that gives me a headache. Muscle Milk weight gainer is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Brian Pool

customer_reviews.title: Be mindful that a single serving is 5 (FIVE) scoops ...
customer_reviews.text: Be mindful that a single serving is 5 (FIVE) scoops. That is a LOT of mix. I didn't have a blender bottle big enough to mix this up. Read the label before making your selection.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L Wade

customer_reviews.title: MuscleTech Mass Tech is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolutely GREAT! Great taste, not the normal chalky taste from other mass gainers. Be advised, THIS STUFF GAINS YOU WEIGHT! Use it in conjunction with a workout schedule that cuts what this makes you gain. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: William Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Taste not good. Seriously.
customer_reviews.text: After drinking muscle milk this is hard to get past the horrible taste. And yes, I tried to have an open mind but ish...

customer_reviews.title: The size seems good, until you realize that one serving is 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not mix well. Even using an immersion blender it's a bit gritty. The size seems good, until you realize that one serving is 5 rather large scoops.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This product is great! This is my first time using a Mass ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! This is my first time using a Mass Gainer and experimented by adjusting usage (scoops). Works best for me as single scoop, post workout. Mixes well and tastes great

customer_reviews.title: More important for me taste .. taste so good
customer_reviews.text: According to the size of the price is very convenient. taste delicious

customer_reviews.title: No Pain No Gain
customer_reviews.text: Now this helps me to get and keep my gains! Good in bulking season because it is significantly higher in carbs. It is one of their cleaner mass builder because it is made with oats and quinoa. Also a good meal replacement for when I don’t have time to sit down and eat. Will continue to purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like dirt
customer_reviews.text: I’m not new to powder drinks/supplements and this is by far the worst I’ve ever tasted. I’d love to know a way to make it taste better.

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: Flavor was eh okay at most But it was so thick it barely came out of the bottle. Would not but again, probably won’t even finish the one I just bought.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: This protein has a great taste for someone who doesn't mind the higher sugar levels. Great for when you need to refuel quickly after a workout.

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏿
customer_reviews.text: Too thick. I was blending with two scoops before working and the other 3 after . P.s. sometimes i was adding one banana.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product that has everything you need for a bulking ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that has everything you need for a bulking phase. It's got a 3+ to 1 Carb to protein ratio, Creatine, and digestive enzymes, and it tastes great!

customer_reviews.title: he is very loyal to this product so that’s mean it is a good product

customer_reviews.title: Good carb/protein ratio
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! You can add quality weight when taking it because it’s not just full of carbs, comes with a lot of protein and the carb:protein ratio is really awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting product
customer_reviews.text: Too many of these type of products taste just OK. This one was great. While I haven't seen huge gains yet, it was just the type of product I needed after many intense workouts. Very filling.

customer_reviews.title: not good and just commercial

customer_reviews.title: works well

I mix in some extra bcaa and some creatine hcl to go along with the creatine already present. I feel like it is helping in my recovery between workouts, and feeding the muscle the way it needs to be. I cam definitely tell that I have had better energy levels with this than with other protein supplements. I won't give it 5 stars because it does leave a heavier and harder to clean residue in my shaker bottle than other supplements do.

product_meta.title: MuscleTech Mass Tech Mass Gainer Protein Powder, Build Muscle Size & Strength with High-Density Clean Calories, Milk Chocolate, 7lbs (3.2kg)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Milk ChocolateAt MuscleTech, our mission is to develop the most scientifically advanced and effective supplements to help you build muscle and strength while you lose weight
feature_bullets: More protein, better quality calories, bigger results.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
